description:
Download Runtastic to reach your health and fitness goals – and have fun along the way – with our top-rated tracking app! 

The Runtastic app tracks your sport and fitness activities (distance, duration, speed, elevation change, calories burned & more) - such as running, jogging, biking & walking - utilizing GPS technology to help you build healthy lifestyle habits and reach exercise goals! What’s more? Runtastic was recently overhauled to enhance your user experience. Take this running app out for a run and enjoy improved app design, optimized features & new functionality. 

The Runtastic running app is a great fit for users of all health and fitness levels. Let’s go!

APP FEATURES (limited in lite version):
- Track workouts in real-time with built-in GPS & monitor your personal training diary
- Dashboard configuration: Display preferred training statistics 
- Voice Coach: Audio feedback based on your personal specifications
- Challenge a Run: Compete against yourself by challenging past activity results 
- Auto Pause: Session paused automatically when you stop moving 
- Routes: Create or find exercise routes on Runtastic.com & sync to smartphone 
- LIVE Tracking & Cheering: Share location, receive messages & cheers 
- Training goals: Select heart rate zone, calorie goal or pace goal to optimize training 
- Interval training & coaching and dynamic split tables 
- Powersong: Integrated music player & Powersong to give workout a boost 
- Orbit Connect: View activity stats on Runtastic Orbit, our 24-hour wearable
- Mapping: Detailed live mapping & historic mapping (Google Maps) 
- Graphs: Elevation, pace, speed & heart rate info from your jog, run or walk 
- Colored Traces: Colors indicate training changes, such as pace & elevation
- Geotagging: Take photos during workout & see pics online with map trace 
- Weather, temperature & sunrise/sunset data to assist with scheduling of training 
- Post-activity details: Enter mood & surface info, receive hydration recommendation
- Integration with Apple Health
- Integrate Runtastic activities to your MyFitnessPal account
- Manual entry of workouts: Add treadmill, spinning, weight lifting workouts & more
- Monthly & overall metrics for distance, number of workouts, duration & calories burned 
- iCloud: Settings synchronized when upgrading from LITE to PRO app 
- Share your exercise activities on Facebook, Twitter & email 

Save all workouts on Runtastic.com. In the Runtastic online community, you'll get further analysis, coaching & encouraging comparisons to friends! These benefits keep you motivated while striving to reach fat burning, cardio training or overall health & wellness goals. You can also choose an expert training plan! Training plans provide coaching & inspiration for fitness goals like: weight loss, building endurance, jogging a 10k, running a half-marathon, running a marathon or attaining a beach body. 

Plus, try out Runtastic Music - Running Vol. 2. Runtastic has partnered with Universal Music – the world's undisputed leader in music publishing, to create scientifically-engineered music compilations. Boost your motivation and focus with tunes from Lady Gaga, OneRepublic, Bastille & more!

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: Runtastic GPS Running, Walking, Jogging, Marathon & Fitness Tracker
trackName: Runtastic GPS Running, Walking, Jogging, Marathon & Fitness Tracker
releaseNotes:
- Enjoy Runtastic on your iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus with optimized design & graphics
- Analyze a variety of activity data within Apple Health thanks to our advanced integration

Enjoy the latest version of our app! We look forward to your helpful reviews in the App Store!
